summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies the type of output stream produced by a multiplexer. This enumeration is used with the AVEncMuxOutputStreamType property.

member.name: eAVEncMuxOutput.eAVEncMuxOutputAuto
member.summary: The multiplexer automatically selects whether to output an elementary stream, a program stream, or a transport stream.

member.name: eAVEncMuxOutput.eAVEncMuxOutputPS
member.summary: The multiplexer outputs a program stream.

member.name: eAVEncMuxOutput.eAVEncMuxOutputTS
member.summary: The multiplexer outputs a transport stream.
